text: Mustafa Şentop (born on 6 August 1968) is a Turkish politician. He was a member of the Justice and Development Party (AK Party). He was the Member of Parliament for İstanbul in the Turkish Parliament since 2011. On 24 February 2019, he was elected as the 29th Speaker of the Grand National Assembly. He served as the Speaker of the Grand National Assembly until June 2023 ==Other websites== *MP profile at the Grand National Assembly website *Collection of all relevant news items at Haberler.com Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Turkey
title: Mustafa Şentop
